languages.text: {n}Бывший Наместник морщится, словно от зубной боли.{/n} "Каюсь. Я, грешным делом, считал, что порядок надо насаждать, убивая вредных Футфолу людей и оберегая полезных. Вешая возмутителей спокойствия, поощряя торговцев и исследователей. А, оказывается, надо было просто перевешать всех подряд и пустить пулю в лоб всей торговле сектора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Бывший Наместник морщится, словно от зубной боли.{/n} "Каюсь. Я, грешным делом, считал, что порядок надо насаждать, убивая вредных Футфолу людей и оберегая полезных. Вешая возмутителей спокойствия, поощряя торговцев и исследователей. А, оказывается, надо было просто перевешать всех подряд и пустить пулю в лоб всей торговле сектора".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."
languages.original_text: {n}Бывший Наместник морщится, словно от зубной боли.{/n} "Каюсь. Я, грешным делом, считал, что порядок надо насаждать, убивая вредных Футфолу людей и оберегая полезных. Вешая возмутителей спокойствия, поощряя торговцев и исследователей. А, оказывается, надо было просто перевешать всех подряд и пустить пулю в лоб всей торговле сектора".

traits.locale_text: {n}The ex-Liege grimaces, as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that killing the harmfuls and protecting the usefuls was how you maintained order on Footfall. Hanging the rabble-rousers; encouraging the traders and researchers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all of the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆一脸苦相，仿佛牙疼一般。{/n}“这一点我无可否认。我本以为，我应该杀死那些对落脚港有害的人，保护那些有用的人，绞死那些暴乱分子，鼓励商人与研究人员。我本以为我应该用这种方式来维持秩序，但看来是我错了。原来我应该把所有能见到的人统统绞死，把整个地区的一切商业活动都付之一炬。”
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆一脸苦相，仿佛牙疼一般。{/n}“这一点我无可否认。我本以为，我应该杀死那些对落脚港有害的人，保护那些有用的人，绞死那些暴乱分子，鼓励商人与研究人员。我本以为我应该用这种方式来维持秩序，但看来是我错了。原来我应该把所有能见到的人统统绞死，把整个地区的一切商业活动都付之一炬。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}元領主は奥歯が痛いかのようなしかめっ面を見せた。{/n}「異論はない。ずっと、フットフォールにとっての害を殺し、有用な者を保護することで秩序を守るべきだと考えていた。暴徒を吊るし、商人や冒険家を支援する。だが、私は馬鹿だった。最終的には、捕まえられる者は誰でも殺して、セクターの商業者全員を銃殺刑の前に晒すべきだったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}元領主は奥歯が痛いかのようなしかめっ面を見せた。{/n}「異論はない。ずっと、フットフォールにとっての害を殺し、有用な者を保護することで秩序を守るべきだと考えていた。暴徒を吊るし、商人や冒険家を支援する。だが、私は馬鹿だった。最終的には、捕まえられる者は誰でも殺して、セクターの商業者全員を銃殺刑の前に晒すべきだったんだ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}El antiguo Señor hace una mueca, como si le doliera la boca.{/n} «Eso no se discute. Pensaba que el orden debía imponerse matando a la gente dañina para Paso y protegiendo a aquellos que eran útiles. Ahorcando a los agitadores. Incentivando a los comerciantes y exploradores. Debo de ser tonto. Resulta que debería haber ahorcado a todo el que pillara y haber puesto a todo el comercio del sector ante el pelotón de fusilamiento».
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Señor caído hace una mueca, como si le doliera la boca.{/n} «Eso no se discute. Pensaba que el orden debía imponerse matando gente dañina para Paso y protegiendo a aquellos que eran útiles. Ahorcando a los agitadores. Incentivando a los comerciantes e investigadores. Soy bobo. Resulta que debería haber ahorcado a todo el que pillara y haber puesto a todo el comercio del sector ante el pelotón de fusilamiento».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der ehemalige Lehnsherr zieht eine Grimasse, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Dagegen kann ich nichts sagen. Ich dachte, Ordnung stellt man her, indem man alle tötet, die schädlich für Footfall sind, und indem man die Nützlichen beschützt. Die Unruhestifter hängen, die Händler und Entdecker fördern. Ich Narr. Jetzt zeigt sich: Ich hätte einfach jeden hängen sollen, den ich in die Finger kriege, und die gesamte Wirtschaft des Sektors vor ein Erschießungskommando stellen."
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der ehemalige Lehnsherr zieht eine Grimasse, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Dagegen kann ich nichts sagen. Ich dachte, Ordnung stellt man her, indem man alle tötet, die schädlich für Footfall sind, und indem man die Nützlichen beschützt. Die Unruhestifter hängen, die Händler und Forscher fördern. Ich Narr. Jetzt zeigt sich: Ich hätte einfach jeden hängen sollen, den ich in die Finger kriege, und die gesamte Wirtschaft des Sektors vor ein Erschießungskommando stellen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}L'ancien suzerain grimace comme s'il était pris d'une rage de dents.{/n} « Indubitablement. Et moi qui pensais que l'on imposait l'ordre en tuant les individus néfastes et en protégeant les plus utiles, en pendant les fauteurs de troubles et en encourageant les marchands et les explorateurs... Suis-je bête. Apparemment, j'aurais mieux fait de pendre tous ceux qui me tombaient sous la main et de condamner à mort l'ensemble du commerce du secteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ex-suzerain grimace comme s'il était pris d'une rage de dents.{/n} « Indubitablement. Et moi qui pensais que l'on imposait l'ordre en tuant les individus néfastes et en protégeant les plus utiles, en pendant les fauteurs de troubles et en encourageant les marchands et les chercheurs... Suis-je bête. Apparemment, j'aurais mieux fait de pendre tous ceux qui me tombaient sous la main et de condamner à mort l'ensemble du commerce du secteur. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Mukaddem Emîr, dişi ağrıyormuş gibi yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Doğruya doğru. Ben de Binliman'a zararı olanları öldürüp işe yarayanları koruyunca bir şey olacak sanmıştım. Milleti galeyana getirenleri asıp tacirlere ve kâşiflere teşvikler sundum ama halt etmişim. Önüme geleni sallandırıp sektörde ticaret yapan herkesi idam mangasının karşısına geçirsem daha iyiymiş."
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege grimaces as if from toothache.{/n} "No arguing with that. Here I thought that order should be imposed by killing the people who are harmful to Footfall and protecting the useful ones, hanging rabble-rousers and encouraging traders and explorers. More fool me. Turns out I should've just hanged whoever I could grab, and put all the sector's commerce in front of the firing squad."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mukaddem Emîr, dişi ağrırmış gibi yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Doğruya doğru. Ben de Binliman'a zararı olanları öldürüp işe yarayanları koruyunca bir şey olacak sanmıştım. Milleti galeyana getirenleri asıp tacirlere ve kâşiflere teşvikler sundum ama halt etmişim. Önüme geleni sallandırıp sektörde tecim eden herkesin karşısına idam mangasını diksem daha iyiymiş."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
